function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Insufficient maintenance and operation decisions for urban green spaces due to fragmented responsibilities","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited focus on green spaces within the public services office leading to neglect and underfunding","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear definition for neighborhood and urban parks","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of regulatory focus on ecosystem services function of parks","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Underestimation of park scale and usage categories","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of access to cleaner and efficient sources of fuel for cooking leading to health hazards","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on biomass fuel leading to poor indoor air quality in households","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of harmful fuels for lighting","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Slow progress in the adoption of cleaner fuels","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low global access to clean cooking","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Indoor air pollution due to biomass and coal smoke","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Premature deaths due to the use of coal and solid biomass for cooking","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Granger causality test results suggest a potential causal relationship between pandemic and gini","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Changes in welfare policies may impose large welfare losses on high-wage workers","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Tax system modifications may lead to welfare losses for high-income earners","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pandemic events impacting global economies","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unpredictability and exogeneity of pandemic events","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data privacy and confidentiality","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential cyber viruses affecting robots","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of industrial robots may lead to higher risk of disease transmission if not properly managed.","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective public health messaging","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of personal protection measures without local vector control","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of concern for disease and concern for bites on disease burden","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Individuals reassessing their use of personal protection based on concern for disease and being bitten","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High community-level control","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low community-level control of vector spread","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of personal protection impact on outbreak size","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of personal protection measures","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate community-level vector control","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on human mobility for the spatial spread of the virus may lead to uncontrolled propagation in densely populated areas with high mobility.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Environmental concern regarding pesticide use can lead to a decrease in demand for mosquito control measures, impacting the control of disease-carrying mosquitoes.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Assuming 80% efficacy of personal protective measures against mosquitos may lead to underestimation of transmission rates and disease spread.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Individuals continuously assess their protection status based on the adult mosquito population size and the prevalence of infected humans.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Aggregate average public demand for local-level vector control by authorities is dictated by the infected human population.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difficulties in implementing and maintaining broad-scale mosquito control programs due to financial and environmental considerations","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on personal protective measures in mosquito control efforts","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitations of population-level approach to vector control and lack of consideration for individual-level personal protection","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Expanding urbanization, international travel, trade, and population growth contributing to potential for mosquito-borne disease outbreak","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of capacity for essential vector-control operations in community vector control organizations","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to infectious agents","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High agent exposure times","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Application of exposed in informing building design and minimizing occupant exposure","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unclear restrictions on building occupancy","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inconsistent social distancing recommendations in different countries","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorrect prediction of return to normalcy","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on the construction industry","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long-term impact of covid-19 on construction projects","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher average scores for software and hardware in group a compared to group b may indicate unequal access to technology for remote work.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Differences in the perceived impact of covid-19 on the construction industry between group a and group b may reflect variations in experiences and perspectives related to the pandemic.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
